column4: it  makes no difference, you can start off with warty and dist-upgrade to whatever current is btw.
looks like I will have to end up doing that only. Just wanted to make sure that nothing gets broken along the way.
*nod* mostly its foolproof, but stuff does happen ... i've never had a debian / ubuntu system unfixeable doing an upgrade
Yeah, I agree with that.I really do bow down to the power of apt in that regard.
